catalog-data.title: Backstrap Side Stripe Trousers
catalog-data.description: You'd be hard-pressed to find a retro-focused design with more contemporary life in them, than this Thom Browne pair of trousers. A classic backstrap harkens back to vintage suiting, while the cut and stripe detail place it in the present.

catalog-data.title: Borrowed Tailored Trousers
catalog-data.description: You'd be hard-pressed to find a retro-focused design with more contemporary life in them, than this Thom Browne pair of trousers. A classic backstrap harkens back to vintage suiting, while the cut and stripe detail place it in the present.

catalog-data.title: Carretto Print Bag
catalog-data.description: Boasting a multicolor Carretto print covering the entire canvas bag, this accessory has two rounded top handles and polished gold-tone chain shoulder straps that exude Italian decadence.

catalog-data.title: Fox Print T-shirt
catalog-data.description: Known for reshaping its signature fox motif, the shop delivers this cotton T-shirt that is printed with a playful iteration of the house's whimsical animal.

catalog-data.title: Gift Card
catalog-data.description: Explore our gift card ideas for the perfect pieces for graduations, birthdays & anniversaries.

catalog-data.title: Gradient Fringed Scarf
catalog-data.description: Woven from a soft blend of alpaca wool, this Isabel Marant scarf is part of the brand's AW21 collection and features a gradient effect in shades of green. It's finished with an embroidered logo at the front and fringed edges for added texture.

catalog-data.title: Graphic Print T-shirt
catalog-data.description: Crafted from 100% cotton, it is detailed with a playful graphic print on the chest. Two branded details, a logo print on the front and a signature patch on the sleeve, assure a recognisable look.

catalog-data.title: Pocket Tailored Trousers
catalog-data.description: You'd be hard-pressed to find a retro-focused design with more contemporary life in them, than this Thom Browne pair of trousers. A classic backstrap harkens back to vintage suiting, while the cut and stripe detail place it in the present.

catalog-data.title: Sunset Chain Bag
catalog-data.description: Released in 2016, Sunset bag is one of the label's iconic styles. This structured mini bag features an accordion design and is emblazoned with the signature YSL monogram.
